an4.156:4.1: “Mendicants, an eon contains four uncountable periods.
an4.156:4.3: When an eon contracts, it’s not easy to calculate
an4.156:4.4: how many years, how many hundreds or thousands or hundreds of thousands of years it takes.
an4.156:5.1: When an eon remains fully contracted, it’s not easy to calculate
an4.156:5.2: how many years, how many hundreds or thousands or hundreds of thousands of years it takes.
an4.156:6.1: When an eon evolves, it’s not easy to calculate
an4.156:6.2: how many years, how many hundreds or thousands or hundreds of thousands of years it takes.
an4.156:7.1: When an eon remains fully evolved, it’s not easy to calculate
an4.156:7.2: how many years, how many hundreds or thousands or hundreds of thousands of years it takes.
an4.156:7.3: These are the four uncountable periods of an eon.”
